00025  */

00037 namespace affymetrix_calvin_array
00038 {
00039 
00040 /*! A class to store an audit entry associated with an array. */
00041 class ArrayAuditEntry
00042 {
00043 public:
00044         /*! Constructor */
00045         ArrayAuditEntry();
00046 
00047         /*! Destructor */
00048         ~ArrayAuditEntry();
00049 
00050 protected:
00051         /*! The user name creating the audit entry. */
00052         std::wstring userName;
00053 
00054         /*! The type of action being performed. */
00055         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType actionType;
00056 
00057         /*! The guid to the physical array associated with the action. */        
00058         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType arrayGuid;       
00059 
00060         /*! A list of guids for the input file ids to the action. */     
00061         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidTypeList inputFileGuids;      
00062 
00063         /*! A list of guids for the output file ids from the action. */          
00064         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidTypeList outputFileGuids;     
00065 
00066         /*! A list of parameters associated with the action. */
00067         affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValuePairList actionParameters;
00068 
00069         /*! The date and time of the action. */
00070         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime actionDateTime;
00071 
00072 public:
00073         /*! The user name associated with the audit entry.
00074          *
00075          * @return The user name associated with the audit entry.
00076          */
00077         std::wstring &UserName() { return userName; }
00078 
00079         /*! The date and time of the action.
00080          *
00081          * @return The date and time of the action.
00082          */
00083         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime &DateTime() { return actionDateTime; }
00084 
00085         /*! The type of action.
00086          *
00087          * @return The type of action.
00088          */
00089         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType &ActionType() { return actionType; }
00090 
00091         /*! The id of the physical array associated with the action.
00092          *
00093          * @return The physical array id.
00094          */
00095         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType &ArrayGuid() { return arrayGuid; }
00096 
00097         /*! The list of guids for the input files to the action.         
00098         *        
00099         * @return  The list of guids for the input files to the action.          
00100         */       
00101         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidTypeList &InputFileGuids() { return inputFileGuids; }         
00102 
00103         /*! The list of guids for the input files to the action.         
00104         *        
00105         * @return  The list of guids for the output files of the action.         
00106         */       
00107         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidTypeList &OutputFileGuids() { return outputFileGuids; }
00108 
00109         /*! The list of parameters associated with the action.
00110          *
00111          * @return The list of parameters associated with the action.
00112          */
00113         affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValuePairList &ActionParameters() { return actionParameters; }
00114 
00115         /*! Clears the member objects. */
00116         void Clear();
00117 };
00118 
00119 /*! An STL vector of tbd objects */
00120 typedef std::vector<ArrayAuditEntry> ArrayAuditEntryVector;
00121

00123 typedef std::list<ArrayAuditEntry> ArrayAuditEntryList;
00124 
00125 };
